studies.title: Software engineering bachelor's degree
studies.description:
Ability to use a systematic, disciplined and quantifiable approach to software development, operation, and maintenance, to establish and use SOLID engineering principles to obtain reliable software that works efficiently on real machines, as well as to estimate the costs of developments.
 
  All this assuming a thorough knowledge of computer programming, implementation, and planning of computer systems as well as the phases of the software life cycle, from a practical perspective and adapted to the social realities of our country.

studies.title: Front-End development with HTML5 & CSS3
studies.college: Technical University of Madrid - Samsung Tech Institute
studies.description:
A course aimed at both new and experienced web developers and web designers to expand their skills to include upcoming web standards. Through hands-on labs and exercises, the fundamentals of creating web pages with current standards were learned. 
 The course focuses on the HTML5 content layout language and cascading style sheets provided by CSS3. 
 In addition, basic JavaScript concepts and the use of the Bootstrap library are introduced. Students will acquire, among others, skills that will allow them to: 
 
 •  Understand the client-server architecture and the characteristics of web servers, considering the peculiarities of the associated clients. 
 •  Know the HTML language to develop web pages (in all its versions), including text, images, and other multimedia content. 
 •  To provide HTML documents with the capabilities provided by CSS, adapting to usability and accessibility criteria. 
 •  Understand how to integrate the use of JavaScript
